name: Awarapan
plot: A loyal henchman is ordered by his boss to keep an eye on his mistress, and trouble begins when he refuses to kill her.

name: 3 Idiots
plot: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them 'idiots'.

name: Bajrangi Bhaijaan
plot: An Indian man with a magnanimous heart takes a young mute Pakistani girl back to her homeland to reunite her with her family.

name: Sanju
plot: Biopic of the controversial life of actor Sanjay Dutt: his film career, jail sentence, and personal life.

name: Army of the Dear
plot: Following a zombie outbreak in Las Vegas, a group of mercenaries take the ultimate gamble, venturing into the quarantine zone to pull off the greatest heist ever attempted.

name: The Outlaws
plot: Based on real events, this crime action film depicts a Seoul detective's attempts to keep peace while two Chinese-Korean gangs battle over turf in the neighborhood.

name: IP Man
plot: During the Japanese invasion of China, a wealthy martial artist is forced to leave his home when his city is occupied. With little means of providing for themselves, Ip Man and the remaining members of the city must find a way to survive.

name: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
plot: Three friends decide to turn their fantasy vacation into reality after one of their friends gets engaged.

name: Avengers: Infinity War
plot: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

name: The Night Comes for Us
plot: Ito, a gangland enforcer, caught amidst a treacherous and violent insurrection within his Triad crime family upon his return home from a stint abroad.

name: Pushpa: The Rise
plot: A labourer rises through the ranks of a red sandal smuggling syndicate, making some powerful enemies in the process.

name: Furious 7
plot: Deckard Shaw seeks revenge against Dominic Toretto and his family for his comatose brother.

name: Game of Thrones
plot: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.

name: Money Heist
plot: An unusual group of robbers attempt to carry out the most perfect robbery in Spanish history - stealing 2.4 billion euros from the Royal Mint of Spain.

name: Titanic
plot: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

name: Badhaai Ho
plot: A man is embarrassed when he finds out his mother is pregnant.
